title: Playing Cards, "Game of Yellowstone No. 1122", ca. 1890
medium: Laminated paper, photomechanical reproductions, cardboard box
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Dexter J. Purinton
description: Deck of playing cards illustrating the sights of Yellowstone National Park. Uniform decoration on backs of buffalo and wild flowers. Gray cardboard box with gilded lettering and one card listing other games by the same company.

exhibitions.title: Frederic Church, Winslow Homer & Thomas Moran: Tourism and the American Landscape

tombstone.epitaph:
Playing Cards, "Game of Yellowstone No. 1122", ca. 1890.
ca. 1890. Laminated paper, photomechanical reproductions, cardboard box. Gift of Mrs. Dexter J. Purinton. 1955-78-4.
